message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with natural language generation from structured data, which is a problem that falls under the scope of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of NLP tools and the focus on scalability suggest that the paper may also be relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The structured data itself may come from databases (cs.DB) or information retrieval systems (cs.IR). Finally, the paper's focus on generating coherent and fluent paragraphs suggests that it may also be relevant to language modeling and generation (cs.LG).
